title: Low Inflation Helping India’s Economic Growth, Modi Adviser Says
description: The Indian economy is resilient and expected to be the world’s fastest-growing, buoyed by low inflation and underpinned by financial stability, according to a key adviser to Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
content: The Indian economy is resilient and expected to be the world’s fastest-growing, buoyed by low inflation and underpinned by financial stability, according to a key adviser to Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
